name: Drytron Meteonis Alpha Draconids
text: You can Ritual Summon this with "Meteonis Drytron". Other "Drytron" monsters you control cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects. Up to twice per turn, when your opponent activates a monster effect (Quick Effect): You can banish "Drytron" monsters from your GY whose total ATK equal or exceed that monster's original ATK; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that monster. If this Ritual Summoned card you control is destroyed by your opponent: You can Special Summon 1 Ritual Monster with 4000 ATK from your hand or Deck. (This is treated as a Ritual Summon.)
